review_text: This is the second time we've rented this place and I'd like to go back to every visit I visit to California. Certainly I feel at home and the owners are so kind and generous. Highly recommend this beautiful and warm place.
Great, comfortable space - plenty of amenities, convenient- couldn’t be better.
Carol very attentive and helpful loved the place and location

I can't say enough about how pleasant our accommodations were. The host was wonderful and feels like a new friend, the yard was gorgeous and very relaxing, the kitchen lovely & well equipped, the bathroom perfect,the beds comfy and clean. The neighborhood was lovely and convenient to all I needed. I would definitely stay here again.

Lovely place to stay. Was able to have a cooking night with some friends — fully stocked kitchen. Couldn’t manage to find a cutting board but had literally everything else. Definitely worth the booking. A nice space to stay at and wonderful garden area too!

We had a great stay at Carol’s place! We were out and about often, but when we were in the space it was very relaxing, clean, and private. Beautiful little back yard/patio and a great deal of closet and kitchen space.
Super cute little house, very private and comfy!!

We really enjoyed staying at Carol's AirBnB. It truly is a Beautiful private guest suite! It is clean, comfortable, and has everything we needed.
The kitchen is large, well equipped, and very clean. This is the first AirBnB I've stayed at where I was comfortable eating off of the dishes without washing them first. I washed a few the first day, but realized it was not necessary, because the dishwasher works well and I never found any residual dirt.
The beds were comfortable and it was quiet. We slept well every night.
The bathroom was clean, had a nice shower, and everything worked well. I especially liked the way the toilet paper dispenser was installed. Most people probably would not even notice, but I thought it was unusual at first until I used it. Then it made sense. The unusual way it is installed makes it work better! You'll have to see it and try it to understand what I am talking about.
Thank you Carol!

Carol’s place is looks much better than the pictures even! Very clean and beautiful.
She’s sweet and respectful and her place was very comfortable with all needed for convenience.
I would love to stay there again and definitely recommend it.
Carol was a great host with a great central location!

My husband and our dogs and I had a lovely stay at Carol’s. The place was very comfortable with lots of seating (as you can see in the photos). I was happily surprised to see they provided bottled water as not all stays do. Our dogs enjoyed the backyard. There was a gap under one of the doors in the enclosed backyard but the hosts proactively put down blocks so our small dogs could run around the backyard without escaping. One of our dogs got to meet their dog, Luca and they got to play together which was cute! Truly one of the most dog-friendly stays (and we travel with our dogs a fair bit)! If we’re in the area again, Carol’s place is at the top of our list.
Nice, quiet place and neighborhood. Kitchen and bathroom well stocked, beds comfortable, Carol responded quickly to questions. Good location for us to visit family.
Neighborhood was quiet and friendly. Home was perfect for our short getaway. Carol is very friendly and responsive. Highly recommend this home.
Great location and a great host. Place was clean and easy to get to. Everything matched the listing and it’s an overall awesome place! Definitely worth staying here!

Beautiful AirBnB - loved the windows and views to the yard. Well-stocked kitchen with dishes and staples and bottled water in the frij. Comfortable beds, plenty of towels. It was nice to have the large closet for suitcases and shoes etc. we really enjoyed the fireplace and the sunny back patio.
The space was very accommodating, perfect for traveling solo.

I HIGHLY recommend this place. Is exactly what you see in pictures but peaceful and calm. The house is gorgeous, the backyard is amazing and Carol and her husband are always so sweet and helpful.
I would stay more if I could and if I ever need to be back Riverside, for SURE I will be in this place. The most amazing hostess that I have had so far.
it was pleasure to stay in and Carol and her family was very nice and friendly. I highly recommend this place 👌

We loved staying in this beautiful guest suite! We had a private entrance and the room was clean, spacious, and had all the amenities in the listing. Also, there was a big closet with plenty of extra blankets, linens and towels which was a really nice bonus. Carol was super friendly, responsive, and flexible and I would definitely recommend staying here!
AWESOME accommodations, probably the nicest Airbnb I have ever stayed at. She and if I return to the Riverside area, Carol’s place will definitely be at the top of my list for a place to stay!
Everything we needed, comfortable sleep, pleasant, enjoyed the fireplace heater and made use of kitchen for meals.
Second time staying at carols and everything was as expected. Great host, very sweet and nice and has great communication. We love staying here when visiting the area.
Lovely space and friendly host! Everything went as smooth as can be.

We loved to stay here. Lovely place, family friendly and Carol is an amazing hostess. The kitchen is fully equiped with everything you need to cook if you want to just stay in and enjoy a quiet time on your own. We loved their beautiful and peaceful garden where we can read, while calmly drinking some tea or coffee, or just spend some quality time while watching the stars. We will be staying over again for sure. Thank you, Carol. Hoping to come back very soon.
Extremely comfortable and nice please , super peaceful and cozy , loved it .
Absolutely lovely place.
Carol’s guest home was beautiful, clean, and super friendly host. Honestly this was more than I could have ever expected and super grateful I came across this gem.
Love this studio! Beautiful kitchen and bathroom. Carol is so sweet and helpful.
The space was perfect for my needs
It was very pleasant and comfortable. Even the back patio was welcoming!

Hostess greeted me as I unpacked but otherwise there was no need to communicate though she made it clear she and her husband were readily available if need be. Neighborhood was very quiet and plenty of street parking available. Suite was very comfortable and dogs had plenty of room to roam and things to sniff. If I were in this area again, I'd definitely rent here again.
She was actually the sweetest host ever. I showed up at her doorstep on the wrong day and she still accommodated me. I’m just so thankful that she was so gracious of a host really kind spirit.

Carol's place was the perfect location and setting for us. The apartment is as described and worked perfectly for our needs. It was clean and spacious. We loved the fireplace.
Our only concern was communication - we had a couple significant questions that went unanswered over the period we stayed. Carol resolved to our satisfaction a major snafu on the last evening of our stay. We would recommend this place to others - despite the communication problems.
Carol's place was lovely! I felt safe and comfortable. Everything is as described. Carol is a wonderful host, friendly and responsive. The neighborhood is quiet and tidy. Plenty of parking.
Really cozy place with everything you need to stay in or go out!
Very sweet couple would come back every visit if I could. Great spot

I absolutely loved staying here! The studio room I stayed in was clean, nicely furnished, airy, and pretty. There were plenty of sitting, lounging, and work/eating spaces, plus several windows and doors that let natural light in. There is also a full kitchen with sink, refrigerator, and dishwasher (plus other appliances and dishes). I slept great and the bed was very comfy. Carol the host is extremely kind, attentive, and responsive. I only wish that I could have stayed longer!
Really enjoyed her garden with fresh oranges. She is great!
A wonderful 1 room guest house for a weekend trip with some friends! Was clean and cozy, and served us well. Instructions on getting in and finding our spot were clear, and no issues all weekend.

Carol is incredible. She was very accommodating and very quick to respond to any questions. The space was very clean and had all of the necessities to stay. For sure if I came back this always be my favorite place. Thanks Carol for your kindness
great stay, very pleasant and homey. well equipped kitchen

Very well stocked for kitchen supplies, great lighting and amenities to be comfortable in the space…and many cozy places to sit and enjoy the wonderful, open and clean space. The outdoor area was lovely for morning yoga, garden view out of the big windows.
Carol was super responsive. And kind in those responses.
The location is a little out of the way but totally accessible and near beautiful neighborhoods and parks for a nice walk.
Thanks Carol. I really enjoyed your space.

Enjoyed my stay at Carol's place. The unit is attached to the house but very private with a lovely outdoor space. Pics and description very accurate. Carol was responsive and flexible and overall really nice. I would definitely go back.

We've stayed at quite a few rental units in Riverside in the last couple of years and Carol's place is by far the nicest place for the money. Everything in the apartment from the appliances to the cabinets to the furniture is almost brand new. Having your own outdoor space is great too!!
Great place - convenient with nearby restaurants and grocery stores. Airbnb had everything we needed.
lovely place . very spacious and has a modern kitchen . the patio is very beautiful and a great place to relax.

This was the most comfortable and spacious BnB that I've stayed in recently, and it was as neat as a pin. The kitchen options were impressive, not the least of which were the real coffee machine and dishwasher. The place felt like part of a home, not a unit fixed up just to serve as a BnB. The hosts responded quickly to my inquiries and were there right away to help when I couldn't open the lock. I would have loved to lounge more on the beautiful, private patio, had my visit been on less windy days.
It was a perfect stay! I felt very cozy and comfortable. We had all the amenities we needed!
Wonderful place!

It was a lovely stay! We had everything we needed and everything was really close. The parking on the street is not an issue and the neighborhood was extremely peaceful. Would love to come back to this beautiful stay!!
Great place and very well priced. Loved our stay.
Carol’s place is comfortable and private. A very pleasant place to stay!

Felt like home! Carol has a designer’s eye for detail and we were in want of nothing during our weeklong stay - from plush towels and pillows to the well appointed kitchen and lovely little garden in back this place felt cheerful yet refined, and met all our needs. Her choice of colors throughout and the airy, light-filled rooms were super appreciated, as well as the mix of antique and contemporary furnishings. Highly recommend and hope to stay here again!
Nice, safe neighborhood and cozy space. Very clean and would stay again.
Carol place is nice and clean we had a good time also parking on the st. was not bad, the area is nice and secure… I recommended!!!!

This charming place is the best place to stay if you are in Riverside. Its fresh clean, and super comfy and well decorated. With the cutest kitchen. The photos do not do this charming place just. I did not get a chance to meet Carol and her husband, but my husband did and he said they are super nice and welcoming host.
David & Lisa

Overall, we enjoyed our stay with Carol! The house was clean and provided us with we needed for our short term stay. Carol was very quick to respond to all of our messages and concerns. We would highly recommend staying here and would stay here ourselves again.

Carol was an outstanding hostess. The place is PERFECT for two/three people but as her ad states, not particularly child proof. However our small dogs (we came for a dog show) and my daughter and I were well received and all questions answered promptly. We had a sweet visit with Carol face to face so she could meet out pups. We will forever search her out when we come to the area
We had an excellent stay at this lovely AirBnB. We enjoyed walking to the grocery store/other stores and using the kitchen to cook. We would definitely recommend staying at this listing!

Carol’s place is a must!! It’s beautiful and comfortable. Nice neighborhood. All the amenities. Feels like home. You will love it!! Good Internet. Comfy bed. Sweet kitchen. Great shower. Don’t miss this one!!

Carol is an exceptional hostess and a lovely person.
The suite was perfect. The area is very quiet and backyard is tranquil and was great to sit out in the morning and do some reading while drinking coffee and getting ready for the day.
I can't recommend Carol's AirBnB enough. You will not be disappointed
A wonderful home in a wonderful location. Host is amazing and has great communication. Would book again!
This is like a little oasis in the middle of a bustling community. A great combination of indoor and outdoor space. Absolutely awesome kitchen and studio setup. Our little dog had a great time
Carol’s place is so nice that it feels like home. It is tastefully decorated and has everything you need to be comfortable.
Carol was very nice & helpful! The suite is very clean & in a great neighborhood

Very clean, spacious and amenities were exactly as promised. Quiet and friendly neighborhood, which my wife and I enjoyed on a walk through the nearby historic palm district. Carol was very responsive, access was easy and we truly enjoyed our stay. I would not hesitate to stay here again… or recommend to others!

We stayed at Carol’s place for a few days, it is just as described!! She has great communication. Location was perfect for what we were there for. The beds/pillows and sofa are comfortable, the unit was clean. We took time to enjoy the back yard and relax in the warm California weather. This place is welcoming and so was Carol and Luca!! If in the Riverside area we would most definitely stay here again.

My stay with Carol was very pleasant. The space was clean, spacious, and very open. I booked this place for a spot to rest after work and it provided that and more. The way everything is setup kind of inspired me to rearrange my own place a bit 😆

Carol has great "in-law suite" to share with you! The neighborhood was quiet and it felt safe - and the neighbors we saw were friendly, too! It also has a central location to everything we wanted to do in Riverside. There was plenty of free parking on the street in front of the house and the furnishings were excellent. The private entrance along the side of the house was a big plus for us. The bed was comfortable and it was nice to have an outdoor patio space to hang out in, even though we didn't use it during our short stay. The internet was excellent and the appliances were high-quality. We were aware that Carol was on property during our stay, but the space also felt very private. Overall, the quality of this space was top-notch and that made it a great stay for us! We recommend that you try Carol's space when visiting Riverside! I hope it's available next time we are in the area, for sure. David & Brad
Clean,would stay again.

This special cottage will not disappoint anyone who stays here. The location was perfect. Walking distance to restaurants and downtown Riverside. The fruit trees were delicious, flowers were beautiful and the yard was simply Lovely. My son & I absolutely loved this cottage. It was so cozy, and everything about this cottage made you feel at home. I made breakfast and enjoyed the cooking pans that were available. If I had any questions Jennifer and Ken would immediately respond. This lovely couple go above and beyond to for their guest. I especially loved that this cottage felt safe, & was also walking distance to Mount Rubidoux & plenty of restaurants. My son & I would look forward to coming home to their two friendly dogs. Thank you Jennifer & Ken for making our stay a positive experience. We will definitely be back to this beautiful cottage!
had a wonderful mothers day weekend! thank u so much 💓

Great, quiet place, beautiful garden, great surroundings.
Very dear dogs.
You can go for a walk. Mount Rubidux is a short walk away on several paths.
The cottage was so peaceful and a great spot for getting around Riverside. The garden is so beautiful. Inside was clean and well stocked. The hosts were helpful and responsive!

We have stayed numerous times, and every time is wonderful. It really is like coming home. The gardens are beautiful, the hosts are very friendly and helpful, and the accommodations are just right.
We look forward to our next stay !
We had a peaceful, enjoyable, comfortable stay. The property was as advertised. The hosts are very friendly, the fruit trees are lovely, the dogs are sweet. 10/10 Reccomend this spot!
Felt very comfortable and safe, thank you 😊

Jennifer’s place was great, location was close to down town but felt like we were fare away. The gardens we beautiful, the place was very quiet and close to great walking trail. I would recommend and would stay again.
Always a favorite

Ken & Jennifer were super. The cottage was private, clean, and comfortable. The hosts were helpful and accommodating. We enjoyed our visit very much. Ken & Jennifer were helpful with regards to places to eat, grocery shop and provided add'l recommendations when asked. If there is a need or time, we may revisit the area, without reservation, we would look to secure their cottage.
Very cute location and the place is relaxing
Great stay….. Jennifer and Ken were very kind

My daughter and I had a fantastic experience here. The hosts greeted us at the cottage and were kind and helpful. They were responsive the entire time and even let us pick from the fruit trees! The house was cute, clean and very comfortable. We will absolutely come back if we are back in Riverside.
Outstanding place to stay with lots to see and experience in Riverside. A real gem! The hosts made several suggestions of things to see in Riverside!
Great spot in a lovely area that’s easy to walk around in. We enjoyed the stay, the kind hosts, and friendly dog!
Great peaceful location, easy access to restaurants and downtown

This is the cutest little cottage that doesn’t feel tiny. The surroundings are so dreamy. Their pets, Annie and Norman, are adorable. It was so close to numerous restaurants. You won’t be disappointed!

Ken and Jennifer were really nice towards my family and my self. They were a lovely couple who were always attentive in our needs. They were quickly to respond and very helpful. Plus they have an adorable dogs Norman was a good playful dog that played with my kids it felt like home.
Ken and Jennifer really care about you, see you as a guest, and want you to enjoy your stay. Very responsive and proactive.
Another excellent stay!!

The Cottage is a private, peaceful, well-appointed, lovely landscaped sanctuary within a short walk to the heart of downtown Riverside. My wife and I have stayed there several times and highly recommend it.
Greg P.

We had such a nice stay at Jennifer and Ken’s place. The cottage was so cozy and we were very comfortable- especially our baby, who loved the pack and play and had some amazing snoozes. The bed is very comfortable and the backyard is so peaceful. Ken and Jennifer were so friendly, as were the pups! We hope to stay again soon!

We enjoyed our stay so much! The cottage was so clean and comfortable, and the hosts were friendly and completely responsive. It's a very sweet cottage in a beautiful, upscale neighborhood. Up the hill is private access to a park for walking, running, dog-walking and so forth. The cottage is also close to downtown Riverside, so there are endless options for shopping and eating at nice restaurants. To top it all off, it's Christmas in Riverside and all I can say is "Wow!" I highly recommend Jennifer's cottage!

My stay at Jennifer's and Ken's was absolutely wonderful! We enjoyed every minute spent here from the beautiful scenery of their outdoor garden, the easy access to downtown Riverside, and the cozy feeling of their beautiful cottage. They have everything you need which makes it a very convenient and enjoyable stay. My partner and I were fortunate enough to meet Ken and Jennifer and they truly are the loveliest and sweetest people ever! Hands down one of the best places I have ever stayed at! Thank you loads :).
A great place to stay with the trail and downtown riverside within walking distance. We would definitely stay there again!

Wonderful stay! Ken and Jennifer made us feel right at home. They put thoughtful consideration into making the Airbnb cozy with all the amenities you might need for an extended stay. Hosts were incredibly friendly and helpful, we would be lucky to be able to stay here again and hope to return for our next visit home for the holidays.

We stay at the Cottage a lot because we visit a family member nearby. Jennifer's Cottage has become like a second home to us; it's very comfortable. We love the surrounding trees and garden that Ken ardently cares for and the Cottage is delightful, cozy and clean.

Jennifer and Ken are incredibly nice and down to earth. They definitely take pride in what they do on all levels. Their property is landscaped beautifully and very peaceful. They made sure we had everything we needed and truly wanted us to enjoy our stay. Ken let us take some lemons straight from his tree and even brought us an amazing and delicious dessert! We were able to cook in the cottage kitchen with ease and really enjoyed sitting out on the little patio. Their home is walking distance to downtown but not so close to hear it. There was a Festival of Lights one evening and we felt worlds away. I can't say enough good things about staying here. To top it off, their pups Norman and Annie, are incredibly sweet and will happily let you get your dog fix.

We had a wonderful stay at Jennifer and Ken's cottage! The cottage and the surroundings were beautiful with fruit trees and various flowers and plants. Views of the mountain and yard from kitchen window and living room. If you open the front door, there's a screen door that you can pull out from a pocket. If you pull the screen out you get a full view of Mt. Rubideaux from the kitchen - wow!!
Walked to grocery, restaurants, downtown library (recommend for architecture), historic Mission Inn, ran around the neighborhood, many hikes to Mt. Rubideaux. They have 2 really nice dogs which added another touch of home. Ken and Jennifer greeted us upon arrival and were readily available. Felt very welcomed - super warm and hospitable! Such kind people! Highly recommend!
Amazing cottage! It was a very comfortable place to stay. Jennifer and Ken were the consummate hosts, and the proximity to the walking trail up Mt. Rubidoux made this an excellent stay.
This is our go to place for our visits to the area. It is private, quiet, and a hidden gem.
Loved staying at Jennifer and Ken's! The hosts were so welcoming and their place was perfect for a weekend getaway. Felt completely at home and in our own world.
Jennifer’s cottage was great. My kids and I really enjoyed our stay and felt right at home! Thank you Jennifer
The cottage was perfect for us, thank you for a great stay.

Both Jennifer and Ken were fantastic hosts. They were very accommodating to our needs in moving our daughter back into UCR. They even lent us a ladder. Lovely cottage and beautiful grounds. Thank you again for sharing your cottage with us.

We absolutely enjoyed our stay here. Felt like home away from home. Beautiful and peaceful neighborhood. The host was super nice and very attentive to our needs. Will definitely book again in the future!
Very respectful
Quiet, peaceful, beautiful, comfortable…if that’s describes what you seek in Riverside, this is the place for you.

We loved how quiet and comfortable this cottage was along with the friendly dogs and beautiful yard and garden. One of the best things about this bnb though is how genuinely kind the hosts Jennifer and Ken are. It was our privilege to get to know them a little bit, and we hope we get the chance to stay here again the next time we are in Riverside. Thanks again for a great stay!

Jennifer and Ken were wonderful hosts. Their cottage was very comfortable, and the pride they have in their beautiful garden is unquestionable. The cottage has an excellent location- only a few blocks away from the downtown, steps away from the Mt. Rubidoux- and still was quiet and peaceful.

We stay here a lot! Because we like it so much. We have family in Riverside so we are in the city often during the year and we are so comfortable staying at Jen and Ken's. They are very helpful and the cottage is lovely and cozy for our visit. They have so much pride in their property, everything is so clean, functional and the outside landscaping is beautiful with shrubs, flowers and trees.

Ken was very attentive and kind. Helped us check-in and made some recommendations. We hope to return soon to walk the hike near their home and walk to downtown. We also enjoyed their two fur babies :)

Jennifer's place was wonderful! Our little family had a magical vacation while staying at the cottage. We loved our mornings siping coffee on the porch in the beautiful yard, the fruit trees were full of amazing peaches and plums during our stay. The cottage was perfectly prepared for our stay, a lovely mix of cozy, while being extremely clean and organized.
Great spot. Great little place & Jennifer & Ken are the sweetest people I’ve meet.

My daughter and I really enjoyed the place and would recommend highly. It is a very beautiful place with amazing fruit trees and a hiking trail right up the street. Very close to downtown for restaurants and whatever you need to get. Thanks again!
One of the best places and hosts that we’ve stayed at. We would definitely stay there again if we’re ever in the area again.
This cottage was perfect for our family of four! We really enjoyed the outdoor garden with plenty of fruit to pick! So beautiful and comfy. Hosts were very friendly!
this was our second stay at the cottage. we love it and feel so comfortable while we’re in town visiting family. thank you ken & jennifer!

My friend and I along with our kids stayed here while we attended their parkour finals in Moreno Valley at Firestorm Galaxy ~15 minutes away. The cozy cottage is tucked away behind the main home with a backyard full of lovingly cultivated fruit trees. It is located within walking distance to downtown Riverside, but far enough away to feel safe leaving the windows and French doors open for natural ventilation while we slept. We especially enjoyed relaxing on the patio with cold beverages, a full belly from cooking a meal in their well-appointed kitchen, and friendly dogs, Norman and Annie, welcoming us after a long drive from Northern California. Jennifer and Ken were excellent hosts! The instructions to check in and out were very clear. Inquiries were answered quickly. We'll definitely stay here again if our kids qualify for the finals next year!

This cottage is so so cute and the outdoor area also very well kept. This is an excellent choice! I stayed here with my mom and kids while I attended a conference. It was perfect. The hosts are hands on, but they’re super helpful throughout the stay. Hosts are communicative, very welcoming and super kind!
We have stayed here several times. It has great consistency. It is very clean, quiet and convenient. We look forward to staying here again.
We have stayed at Jennifer’s more times than I can count. They are wonderful hosts and even had some special things that we requested. A great place.
My family of 5 was extremely pleased with our stay. It was a nice cozy experience. The view inside and out are great. We would come back again .

Had a great stay and felt right at home. Ken and Jennifer are some of the nicest people you’ll ever meet. Beautiful surroundings with all the hard work they put into their back yard! Would stay here again for sure.
We loved our trip back to Riverside and really enjoyed our stay here. The gardens were immaculate and the space felt private.

We very much enjoyed our stay at the cottage! Our daughter loved the dogs right outside and the push car Ken let her use during our stay. We were able to make dinner easily with the kitchen set up and the room had dark out shades perfect for our little sleeper. We will definitely come back when we are in Riverside again!

We have stayed at The Cottage before but this was the first time we stayed in the spring/summer time. Jen and Ken have truly created a lovely place to stay and the outdoor area is beautiful - trees, flowering shrubs, roses, flowers. We loved eating and enjoying a glass of wine outside in the beautiful surroundings. The cottage, of course, was up to its usual high level of cleanliness and cozy decor. We'll be back!
The stay at Jennifer’s was one of the best Airbnb’s ever! We thoroughly enjoyed the place, the location, the friendly hosts and dogs!

Very nice stay, beautiful location, very close to the walking trail up Mt. Rubidoux, comfortable bed, wonderful sitting area in a beautiful garden with citrus trees and flowers. Jennifer and Ken were very helpful.

Ken and Jennifer are a sweet and helpful couple. Their place is really close to an awesome hike in a safe and beautiful part of the city.
The fruit trees in the yard were a fun extra.

Jennifer, Ken, Annie and Norman were all a delight! It was easy to find the place and the landscaping was gorgeous. Jennifer and Ken met us as we arrived and showed us around the place, explaining the rules and showing us about their beautiful garden.
My friends and I were in town for Coachella, so we weren't there very often, but it was very comfortable for sleeping. We made a few meals and even used a lemon off the tree in the garden. Home was clean and came with basic needs like cutlery, plates, and pans.
Our stay was very pleasant and I would highly recommend this stay to anyone in the Riverside area.
I really enjoyed my time at this peaceful oasis. The hosts are attentive to every detail.
Beautiful place to stay and Jennifer and Ken were the best hosts!! All positive experiences here, highly recommended!
This is an amazing place. The Jennifer and her husband were great host, I will definitely be back.
Great place to stay. The hosts were very attentive and recommended some great spots to check out! We will definitely be back when we're in town!

The cottage is located right under mount Rubideux. The surrounding garden on the property is simply beautiful. The cottage is very comfortable, very nicely decorated and designed and the hosts are great ! Would highly recommend ❤️
Great place, beautiful garden, wonderful hosts. Wouldn’t have changed a thing. Look no further if staying in Riverside.

Another excellent stay at The Cottage! Since this was our second time booking with Jennifer, this trip felt more like a visit with family rather than with an Air BnB. Everything was exactly as we had remembered, perhaps even better. She may have added an extra luggage rack and blackout curtains since the last time I visited. She was proactive in reaching out the day prior to check-in, and was nice enough to turn on the heater so that the space was warm upon our arrival. There is so much storage space and all the amenities you could need. Her and her husband are both very friendly and hospitable, even offering us fresh fruits from their trees. By far my favorite Air BnB listing, and we look forward to returning again in the future!
Jennifer is a wonderful host. We’ve stayed here many times and will come back again. Her home is in a beautiful neighborhood, close to downtown.
We absolutely loved our stay. We will definitely stay again.
Jennifer’s cottage is cozy and comfortable with all the amenities. Great location right next to Mount Rubidoux.
The cottage was perfect. Great location. Super comfortable. It had everything I needed. Excellent hosts. Exactly as advertised—better, actually.
An absolutely beautiful spot to stay. Walk to MT Ribidoux trail head. Close to downtown and easy to get anywhere you want to go.

My wife and I have stayed at The Cottage 3 times and have booked a 4th. It's the best place to stay in Riverside (and we've stayed in a bunch). Great location -- walk to a charming downtown -- excellent owners, beautiful, private accommodations and landscaping.

We had a really nice stay! My husband and I love the neighborhood and it was an extra bonus having Mt Rubidoux right up the street! Highly recommend this stay to anyone looking some something peaceful close to downtown. Jennifer and her husband were incredibly friendly and kind.
I was glad to have found this quiet oasis, walkable to both a hiking trail and restaurants. A true gem.

The Cottage was a warm and comfortable place for us to stay during our visit to attend a family funeral in Riverside. We enjoyed the peaceful environment, beautiful yard with citrus trees, and visits from their dogs, Norman and Annie. The check in and check out were easy and we highly recommend The Cottage.
nice cozy place, recomended

Jennifer and Ken were phenomenal hosts! They gave clear instructions and made our visit a breeze. We really appreciated their flexibility with a late check-in and excellent communication all round.
A major unexpected bonus was getting to hang out with their adorable dogs and pick fresh citrus from the trees in their yard!

A lovely cottage with all the necessities including a nice patio and garden. Check-in and check-out were easy. We had a wonderful stay. It had everything we needed and we felt right at home. We will definitely stay here again.
Lovely place in great location- right next to Mr. roubidoix trail and walking distance from downtown.
As usual, staying at The Cottage is a positive and joyful experience. Great hosts, excellent accommodations, peaceful neighborhood and a thriving, historic downtown a walk away.

Jennifer and Ken were extremely welcoming; the welcome crew included their dogs Norman and Annie!
The cottage is located in a quiet neighbourhood, easy walk or drive to Downtown Riverside.
The cottage is lovely and includes a semi-private patio to enjoy the backyard. Well-appointed kitchen with all the necessities!

A delightful cottage hosted by a delightful couple - Jennifer and Ken go out of their way to make you feel at home. Their property is beautiful and quaint, a hidden gem that is walking distance to downtown Riverside and Mt. Rubidoux.

Jennifer and Ken provide a thoughtful, well-appointed, and restful cottage close to downtown Riverside. I appreciated the patio/deck, the comfortable bed, and completely stocked kitchen! Thank you for such a restful stay!
great location, comfortable, peaceful porch, clean, cute dogs and friendly hosts. would definitely stay again and 100% recommend. lots of attention to detail.

Jennifer and Ken have created a very desirable place to stay in Riverside. They have really paid attention to the details in this cozy cottage and made it very comfortable. It’s quite new and the decor is nicely done. The queen bed is comfy, kitchen well equipped to serve meals and there’s an intimate sitting area. The landscaping is very beautiful and the cottage has its own outside patio area to enjoy the mature trees and shrubs. The neighborhood is charming and quiet. We recently spent five nights there while visiting a relative and were very impressed with The Cottage. We have already booked this little gem for a Christmas return.

Stayed at Nicole and Anthony's place for an entire month. It was a very pleasant experience. I was especially impressed by:
1. Stylish and modern interior decor: from the color matching furniture and beddings, to a 55 inch hanging smart TV and a QI wireless charging alarm clock, you will be pleasantly surprised by the thoughtful designs and the amount of technologies contained in this little studio.
2. Attention to details: you will find that every switch /cupboard inside the studio are clearly labeled. It is obvious that the hosts have thoroughly considered all aspects of a guest's needs, at least it has everything I needed during my monthlong stay. For example, on-site washer & dryer (with detergents), a full-size kitchen (with cookware utensils and even ingredients), Keurig machine and pods, cleaning supplies, and even spare linen/towels!
3. Timely and clear communications from the host: although I did not meet either Nicole or Anthony, but they were always available to answer my questions during my entire stay- usually within minutes.
4. Conveniently located and great value: within 5 minutes of driving you can find grocery stores, Walmart, restaurants, banks, and medical clinics. It is also very close to the highway. Although it is not located right in downtown Riverside, but the neighborhood (Arlington) is safe, quiet and just a 10- minute drive to downtown Riverside. You cannot find a better deal in this area considering the amount of amenities this place provides.
But do keep in mind that it is a small (but functional) studio, and can get quite warm during summer months due to poor ventilation. You will not likely to enjoy this place if you cannot tolerate living in small spaces, or cannot stand air-conditioning being on most of the time. Lastly, it has a full-sized bed. So if you are taller than 6 ft you might wish to find a place with a bigger bed. All in all I would 10/10 recommend this place to any travelers, and I will most definitely stay at Nicole and Anthony's place again!
